import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

col=['months_as_customer','age','policy_deductable','policy_annual_premium','capital-gains','capital-loss','total_claim_amount','injury_claim','property_claim','vehicle_claim']


plt.figure(figsize=(16,14))
k=1
for i in col :
    plt.subplot(4,4,k)
    sns.distplot(df[i])
    k=k+1
plt.show()

source.978088b4: People who play more chess have claimed more fraud followed by crossfit
source.8130f9b5: People who are working as exec-manager has claimed more fraud transactions
source.6656742f: Policy# 217938 who have Impreza-Suburu has claimed amount of 77,760$ and is identified as Fraud claim
source.13fab0b8: People from Arlington have more auto related incidents which are claimed to be fraud
source.f2872f13: All the above data are almost normally distributed
source.413b3d8f:
1039 features are converted into 944 principal components which constitutes 95.02% variance.

The explained variance tells how much information (variance) can be attributed to each of the principal components
source.6c615b36: 8 Cars which are parked and 8 cars which are theft have claimed fraud.
source.6a1947e2: We do not have any pattern which justifies if customers with more years with the company are claiming fraud insurance.
source.ccd3e59f: Both Male and female have caimed same amount which are fraud
source.09bf2e31: People with occupation as Exec Manager seems to be doing more fraud transactions and people with JD level of education are also involved in more fraud transactions. Comparitively people with less education are claiming more fraud claims.
source.f25fe7db:
We have top 20 fraud claims with policy number and their occupation listed
Policy number 217938 has claimed highest amount of 112320$ and is working as craft-repair
source.2f6e9e94: People from occupation sector Protective-services and education level of JD has highest fraud claimed amount of 87,890$
source.e8bea71c: Auto make of 'Ford' and 'Mercedes' are having highest Fraud claim, 'Chevorlet' and 'Audi' also seems to be claimed equally having Fraud claims
source.28182f7e: Cars which are theft and Parked are marked as ?, we can replace them wiht either NA or No collisison
source.22873753: Even for the policies which have police report have done fraud claims
source.dc28d5c3: For auto claims, single vehicle side collision have claimed highest
source.91428022: Riverwood city from SC state have claimed maximum amount of fraud for auto insurance
